content: That's great advice! I think I'll be able to handle the installation myself, but it's good to know that I can always take it to a local bike shop if I need help. By the way, speaking of bike maintenance, I just fixed the flat tire on my mountain bike a few weeks ago. Replaced the inner tube, cleaned the chain, and it's been running smoothly ever since. Do you have any tips on how to keep my mountain bike's chain clean and well-lubricated?
